org.jamwiki.servlets

Class JAMWikiServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.support.ApplicationObjectSupport
      • org.springframework.web.context.support.WebApplicationObjectSupport
        • org.springframework.web.servlet.support.WebContentGenerator
          • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
            • org.jamwiki.servlets.JAMWikiServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminServlet, AdminVirtualWikiServlet, BlockListServlet, BlockServlet, CategoryServlet, ContributionsServlet, DiffServlet, EditServlet, ExportServlet, HistoryServlet, ImageServlet, ImportServlet, ItemsServlet, LinkToServlet, LoginServlet, LogServlet, ManageServlet, MoveServlet, PasswordResetServlet, PrintableServlet, RecentChangesServlet, RegisterServlet, RolesServlet, SearchServlet, SetupServlet, SpecialPagesServlet, StylesheetServlet, TopicServlet, TranslationServlet, UpgradeServlet, UploadServlet, ViewSourceServlet, WatchlistServlet

    public abstract class JAMWikiServlet
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
    Provides the infrastructure that is common to all JAMWiki servlets. Unless special handling is required all JAMWiki servlets should extend this servlet.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean blockable
      Flag indicating whether or not a blocked user should be able to access the servlet.
      protected String displayJSP
      The prefix of the JSP file used to display the servlet output.
      protected static String JSP_ERROR
      The name of the JSP file used to render the servlet output in case of errors.
      protected static String JSP_LOGIN
      The name of the JSP file used to render the servlet output for logins.
      protected static String JSP_LOGIN_RESET
      The name of the JSP file used to render the servlet output for login reset
      protected static String JSP_VIEW_SOURCE
      The name of the JSP file used to render the servlet output.
      protected boolean layout
      Flag to indicate whether or not the servlet should load the nav bar and other layout elements.
      protected static String PARAM_LOGIN_SUCCESS_TARGET
      Parameter used to indicate that a topic should be the target of a successful login.
      protected static int SLOW_PAGE_LIMIT
      Any page that take longer than this value (specified in milliseconds) will print a warning to the log.

        METHOD_GET, METHOD_HEAD, METHOD_POST

      • handleRequestInternal

        public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleRequestInternal(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Implement the handleRequestInternal method specified by the Spring AbstractController class.
        Specified by:
        handleRequestInternal in class org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        response - The servlet response object.
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView object corresponding to the information to be rendered, or null if the method directly handles its own output, for example by writing directly to the output response.

      • handleSpam

        protected boolean handleSpam(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                             WikiPageInfo pageInfo,
                             String topicName,
                             String contents,
                             String editComment)
                      throws DataAccessException
        Determine if a topic contains a spam pattern, and if so set the appropriate page parameters including a "hasSpam" flag in the ModelAndView object.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        pageInfo - The current WikiPageInfo object, containing basic page rendering information.
        topicName - The name of the topic being examined for spam.
        contents - The contents of the topic being examined for spam.
        editComment - (Optional) The topic edit comment, which has also been a target for spambots.
        Returns:
        true if the topic in question matches any spam pattern.
        Throws:
        DataAccessException

      • handleJAMWikiRequest

        public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView handleJAMWikiRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                         org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView next,
                                                                         WikiPageInfo pageInfo)
                                                                  throws Exception
        Method that will be called by all implementing servlets to handle the servlet request.
        Parameters:
        request - The servlet request object.
        response - The servlet response object.
        next - A ModelAndView object that has been initialized to the view specified by the displayJSP member variable.
        pageInfo - A WikiPageInfo object that will hold output parameters to be passed to the output JSP.
        Returns:
        A ModelAndView object corresponding to the information to be rendered, or null if the method directly handles its own output, for example by writing directly to the output response.
        Throws:
        Exception
